summary: This documentary tells the rise and fall of the Black Panther Party, one of the 20th century's most alluring and controversial organizations that captivated the world's attention for nearly 50 years.
cast: Blair Anderson|Omar Barbour|Julian Bond|Elaine Brown|Scot Brown|William Calhoun|Clayborne Carson|Eldridge Cleaver|Kathleen Cleaver|Dennis Cunningham|Emory Douglas|Flores Forbes|Sherwin Forte|Ronald Freeman|Roland Freeman|Beverly Gage|Ray Gaul|Mike Gray|Jeff Haas|Fred Hampton|Edward Hanrahan|Elbert Howard|Ericka Huggins|Phyllis Jackson|Deborah Johnson|Jamal Joseph|Mike Klonsky|Mark Kurlansky|Bob Lee|David Lemieux|Tarika Lewis|Felipe Luciano|Ron McCarthy|Michael McCarty|Steve McCutchen|Pat McKinley|Mohammed Mubarak|Donna Murch|Huey P. Newton|William O'Neal|Jeffrey Ogbar|Gil Parker|Lise Pearlman|Wayne Pharr|Renault Robinson|Howard Saffold|Bobby Seale|Bob Smitson|M. Wesley Swearingen|Rita Williams Garcia|Landon Williams|Ora Williams|Yohuru Williams|Marvin X.|Gerald Lefcourt|Angela Arnold|Erica Ball|Marlon Brando|William F. Buckley|Jim Dunbar|Rhon G. Flatts|Jane Fonda|Tom Hayden|J. Edgar Hoover|Eric Lockley|Nola Nelson|Richard Nixon|Ronald Reagan|Stu Richel|Jason Torres|Trudy Williams|The Chi-Lites|Mike Douglas|John Lennon|Yoko Ono
title: The Black Panthers: Vanguard of the Revolution
